meanings.definition: A person or thing that adduces evidence or arguments.
meanings.sent1: The adducers in the courtroom presented compelling evidence to support their case.
meanings.sent2: The adducers in the debate brought forth strong arguments to convince the audience.
meanings.sent3: The adducers at the party had everyone engaged in a lively discussion about their favorite topics.
meanings.sent4: The adducers in the meeting were like skilled lawyers, building their case with precision.
meanings.sent5: The adducers in the classroom made learning fun and interactive with their engaging presentations.
